title: F. Scott Fitzgerald's 'The Last of the Belles' (1974) Biography, Drama, Romance | Full Length Movie

sources.title: F. Scott Fitzgerald's 'The Last of the Belles' (1974) Biography, Drama, Romance | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
A semi-fictional account of how writer F. Scott Fitzgerald met his wife while he was in the army and stationed in Alabama in 1919.

Director: George Schaefer
Writers: F. Scott Fitzgerald (short story "Last of the Belles"), James Costigan 
Stars: Richard Chamberlain, Blythe Danner, Susan Sarandon  
Genres: Biography, Drama, Romance  

@CultCinemaClassics
